members.name: TEXT_PLAIN
members.comment: Doc flavor with MIME type = "text/plain; charset=utf-16", print data representation class name = "java.io.Reader" (character stream).

members.name: TEXT_HTML
members.comment: Doc flavor with MIME type = "text/html; charset=utf-16", print data representation class name = "java.io.Reader" (character stream).
Constructs a new doc flavor with the given MIME type and a print data representation class name of "java.io.Reader" (character stream).

param: mimeType - MIME media type string. If it is a text media type, it is assumed to contain a "charset=utf-16" parameter.
throws: IllegalArgumentException - if mimeType does not obey the syntax for a MIME media type string

name: javax.print.DocFlavor$READER
comment: Class DocFlavor.READER provides predefined static constant DocFlavor objects for example doc flavors using a character stream ( java.io.Reader) as the print data representation class. As such, the character set is Unicode.
